Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

> <OLD>
>
> The stegosaurous lumbers closser to the fallen trees, and then senses
danger around the pile. Yet instead of fleeing, he grumbles and growls at
the insecticons, stamping his feet to ward them off, and swiping his tail to
keep them away from the pile. As he does that, the female and the baby
stegosaurous now help to get Rat Trap and Night Shift out by moving the logs
with their mouths, also surrounding them protectively as they do so. It
appeared that NONE of them would move without a fight.

<NEW>

The giant lady bugs hovered for a moment, looking distinctly like
insecticons, even if their configuration was a bit different, but giving off
a definite Unicronian signature. They continued to orient on the path that
Night Shift and Rat Trap took, thier scanning beams moving over the ground.
Then they quickly traced it down to lower area where the Maximal duo sat,
now aided - curiously- by the rather atypical stegosaurous back-up.

They buzzed for a moment as if analyzing the situation and they changed
direction and began heading back towards the battle, and since they are
flying rather than driving or walking they are able to do so at a high rate
of speed.

(TAG)

Preston

--20cf305b122459100004a40844d4
